post.body: Blimey, you're efficient I'm still waiting for gifts to arrive never mind wrapping them!
I  apple one
looked the same 2 me but I only glanced at it 2day
hope you've got some burly roadies for all that gear!
just got the app 2day & I've already got loads of lists. Is it possible 2b 2 organised?
LOL u read my mind
now my RC Dalek has something to fight!
yup 6mm BB cannon
she is so yummy ;)
the film's nowhere near as gruesome as the book
do they use the Force to wash up or do they have 2 do it the hard way?
LOL I read that as "Satanic glow" ;)
are you bored with "I wonder if there will be cake" yet?
we'll all vote for you :-*
Use Twittelator pro for emoticons 
maybe the Dark Side is better.
can you use a voice recorder app to record/prove noise levels?
well stop eating it then
fantastic pics. The goat's a bit creepy though :)
how much do you charge? I could do with a cleaner ;)
use the Force to eliminate no.1 ;)
I got that one it's not bad
aww I was about to feel sorry for you :)
not yet downloaded but found torrent file thanks
probably better to go now & beat the Xmas rush
thanks Santa you never fail to deliver :))
getting all excited. I've had to make do with season 4 and TW for months :)
yup, think I'll leave it & stick with Little Britain on Dave 4 now :)
it's almost 1.20am over here
merry Christmas :)
pleasure & Merry Christmas to you too :)
it's probably banned in the bible ;)
nah, DWM have done a whole thing on Morrisey as the next Doctor - not even a sniff of the Master. Ms Hartigan on the other hand...
there are lots of better headsets - check on the Apple website :)
it's all in my sky planner just in case I can't escape
I've got the surround sound but only 32" screen :(
yup, very happy about that. Must make it back from parents by then
My new morning coffee mug. Wonder if people will get the message? http://snipurl.com/7r4oy
Have discovered the joy of Remember The Milk - fantastic list maker & reminder
Woohoo my RC tank arrived today http://snipurl.com/7r0i7
Ultimate Ears died on me 2day back 2 using sennheisers
gave a thumbs up to a blog (www.strands.com/Dalekkiller/posts/4808102) from Dalekkiller
Is it ok 2 watch DVD b4 wrapping it? Got Bill Bailey dvd 4 my bro 4 Xmas
saved a blog (www.strands.com/Dalekkiller/posts/4807255) from Dalekkiller
Finally got through Strands door and loving having everything in 1 place 
Still waiting for strands invite. Why release an app you can't use??
Stupid iPhone battery was stuck at full & then died. Had to fire up lappie to get it going again.
My Xtand came 2day works in both portrait & landscape mode bit pricey at £24.43 but worth it as so useful & sturdy http://snipurl.com/7upbk
Spent afternoon wiring friend's DVD recorder/virgin box/tv and rewarded with yummy chilli. Om nom nom
Yay, my orchid has flowered :) http://snipurl.com/7so4k
Tioti TV+ is my new top tv app - it has iplayer links as well as sky remote record & suggests other progs based on your choices
Just seen Brendan Fraser on Graham Norton - think he was v pissed :0
Nominate your favourite tweeters http://bit.ly/vSXU
Had great final session with my photography group. Got great shot of river at sunset. http://snipurl.com/7s97j
Re-pinging @BBC: Actor cuts throat on Vienna stage after real knife mix-up: http://is.gd/b91r Ouch!!
Just uploaded my first set of photos to photosynth (seadragon app) & 2nd set on the way. They're under same name as here.
 the Seadragon app spent last hour exploring photos around the world. Some top stuff on there 
Re-pinging @grader: Check out this funny cartoon "Twitter In Real Life" http://hubspot.me/?blgcart by @hubspot LOL
Busbi video recorder arrived. Quality ok for £35 & it fits in pocket. Perfect 4 bowling tmrw. http://snipurl.com/89ply
Send astronauts a Xmas card: http://tinyurl.com/55r442
Now that Pull My Finger made it through there has been a rush of bodily function noise apps - should have their own category in app store ;)
Cool pic of UK at night interesting to see dark patches 8) http://snipurl.com/80mul
Seadragon is an amazing new, free photo app with some amazing pics on it
Biggest full moon 4 15yrs plus meteor showers and it's bloody cloudy  the weather gods must h8 me
WW3 is about to start - my bro has brought his new dog to meet my mum's cat :0
Happy Xmas tweeple getting ready to go to parents' 4 lunch. Could do with day crashed out on sofa *yawns*
Do I open my pressie now, or leave it til morning as I'm bit worse 4 wear?
Nearly fell off the roof clearing off all the reindeer crap
